To request a reassessment of your wife's needs in Gloucestershire, you should contact the Adult Social Care department directly. You can do this by phone at **01452 426868** or by email at **socialcare.enq@gloucestershire.gov.uk**. Unfortunately, the available documents do not specify how long the reassessment process will take.

**Steps to Request a Reassessment:**
- **Contact Adult Social Care:** Use the provided phone number or email to initiate the request.
- **Provide Details:** Be prepared to explain how your wife's needs have changed since her last assessment.

**Additional Resources:**
- For more information, you can visit the Gloucestershire County Council's adult social care webpage: [Gloucestershire Adult Social Care](https://www.gloucestershire.gov.uk/health-and-social-care/adults-and-older-people/).

If you encounter any issues or delays, you might consider looking into the complaints process as outlined in the Gloucestershire County Council Adult Social Care Complaints Annual Report.
